text: Admiral Sushil Kumar Isaac, PVSM, UYSM, AVSM, NM was a Chief of Naval Staff in the Indian Navy. A native of Nagercoil, he ceased to use his surname of Isaacs because it caused confusion with his brother, who shares the same initials and is also a naval officer. He died on November 27, 2019. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths
title: Sushil Kumar (admiral)
